Posts.Content: Hello everyone one,,, I just found out on Tuesday I have pc... really caught me off guard, I am a 53 y/o wm who's psa went from 1.5 to 4.7 in a year, had a biopsy with 12 samples and 1 came back pos. everything else looked normal I was told, he gave me 3 choices,, 1. just watch it. 2. radiation or 3. removal of prostrate. He said the all three options would work for now, but he wanted a bone scan and a ct scan,,, NOW this is where I freak out, the cancer part I was okay with once I found out only 1 was positive, but silly me, I googled bone scan and now I am worried to death ( pardon the term) that it has spread,, I keep thinking of the aches I had in my thighs on and off over the "years", a little pain on my knee cap going down stairs sometimes, the shoulder ache I had a few months ago, all mean it has spread,, I am not getting the bone scan for another 2 weeks, but I don't know how I am going to handle this,, I am obsessing over this.. I know no one knows for sure, but does anyone have a clue what the % of it being spread to my bones? I'm I freaking out myself ? I remember the the day the dr. told me and talked about the cancer and he did not seem concerned at all, that he orders the test on all positive pc patients.... PS I have been reading alot of them members post on all post and have learned so much, it really eased my mind on the pc part,, just the bone part is the hard part right now for me.... THANK YOU in advance of any help someone might offer

AgeInfo.Phrase: off guard  I am a 53 y o wm who's psa

Posts.Title: just found out

Posts.Content: Chuck and Barry,, THANK YOU SOOOOOOOOO MUCH I can not tell you guys how much you just relieved my anxiety, I believe my Gleason score was 6,, I remember seeing that number on the paper but that is a blur, I will find out this week for sure though. I am also very okay with AS and again,, THANK YOU, I think I will be able to take a nap now as the stress just left my body... have a great day

Posts.Title: just found out

Posts.Content: Hello, to my new freinds, I had my bone scan and CT scan moved up to last week and today, found out all negative and cancer free Dr. told me it was fine to just watch and see... so all good news,, THANK YOU ALL again for the info a few weeks ago that kept me calm and able to cope Kent
